name: Opentok Secure Appointment
description: Reference application for a secure appointment using Opentok - Video API - Vonage

MINUTES_SESSION_ALLOWED_BEFORE.description: The amount of time, in minutes, a participant can join the session before it starts

MINUTES_SESSION_ALLOWED_AFTER.description: The amount of time, in minutes, a participant can join the session after it starts

VUE_APP_API_SERVER_URL.description: The deployed server's URL - Please verify that the port is the one your server is running on!

VUE_APP_AUDIO_ONLY.description: Join video session with video unpublished

VUE_APP_SMS_TEMPLATE.value: You have an appointment set for {date} at {time}, please click this link to join! {link}
